description: This Java class in the security package provides a configuration bean that supplies a JwtUtil instance initialized with secret and TTL values sourced from environment variables or default values.

classes.name: JwtUtilProvider
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that provides a JwtUtil bean configured with secret and TTL values from environment variables or default values.

methods.name: JwtUtilProvider (constructor)
methods.description: Initializes JwtUtil with secret and ttlSeconds parameters sourced from environment variables or default values.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the JwtUtil instance managed by this provider.
